constitutionalsection.catchline: Unborn children; protection from abortion; exceptions.
constitutionalsection.para: Except when a woman seeks an abortion necessitated by a medical emergency or when the pregnancy results from sexual assault or incest, unborn children shall be protected from abortion in the second and third trimesters.

source.para: Neb. Const. art. I, sec. 31 (2024); Adopted 2024, Initiative Measure No. 434.
